thread.title: Ghana ace Kwadwo Asamoah fails to climb off Juventus bench despite coach's promise
thread.title_full: Ghana ace Kwadwo Asamoah fails to climb off Juventus bench despite coach's promise

title: Ghana ace Kwadwo Asamoah fails to climb off Juventus bench despite coach's promise
text:
21:10 CET Ghana ace Kwadwo Asamoah fails to climb off Juventus bench despite coach's promise - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Max Allegri did not hand Ghana’s fit-again midfielder Kwadwo Asamoah some game time despite the Juventus coach’s promise that the playmaker would play in Sunday’s match against Bologna. 
The Kumasi-born player sat on the bench for the entire duration of the 3-1 win over Bologna in the Serie A game. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us Leaders of today hate to hear the truth unless that truth will benefit him or her By: Hala Dunie
